text: Dealing with constants Here is an example of how a compiler could handle this in practice. let rec compileExp e vtable place = match e with | Constant (IntVal n, pos) -> if n< 0 then ... elsÃ© if n < 65536 then [ Mips.LI (place, makeConst n) ] else [ Mips.LUI (place, makeConst (n div 65536)) ; Mips.ORI (place, place, makeConst (n mod 65536)) ]
